details.display-value: This Vestri branded bag is used by more touring professionals on the PGA, Champions, and LPGA tours than any other product in golf. These professionals travel weekly with the tools of their trade and they trust them to this quality product. Quite simply, it is the best golf travel bag in the world. Comes with a limited lifetime warranty.
details.name: DESCRIPTION

details.display-value: Designed to be worn on any kind of ride, from a short spin to a longer day in the saddle, the new Women's Core Bib Shorts offer exceptional comfort and value. Cut from a high-stretch fabric, these cycling bib shorts give supportive and fully opaque coverage. Seams are kept to a minimum and carefully positioned to prevent chafing and a proprietary chamois - which also appears in the Womens Classic Shorts - is incredibly comfortable, even on day-long rides. Laser-cut leg grippers, lined with soft silicone create a soft and flattering fit, and prevent the shorts from bunching and moving out of position. Simple, quality comfort for every road rider.
details.name: DESCRIPTION
details.value: Designed to be worn on any kind of ride, from a short spin to a longer day in the saddle, the new Women's Core Bib Shorts offer exceptional comfort and value. Cut from a high-stretch fabric, these cycling bib shorts give supportive and fully opaque coverage. Seams are kept to a minimum and carefully positioned to prevent chafing and a proprietary chamois - which also appears in the Womens Classic Shorts - is incredibly comfortable, even on day-long rides. Laser-cut leg grippers, lined with soft silicone create a soft and flattering fit, and prevent the shorts from bunching and moving out of position. Simple, quality comfort for every road rider.

details.display-value: Vestri's Blind Spot Warning System withcross-traffic alert, is a driver assist feature that helps detect vehicles in blind spots during normal driving and traffic approaching from the sides when reversing out of parking spots.
